meanings.definition: The quality or state of being aggregated.
meanings.sent1: The aggregatenesses of the data made it easier to analyze.
meanings.sent2: The aggregatenesses of the ingredients created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The aggregatenesses of the toys in the room made it look like a colorful playground.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an aggregateness of joy and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The aggregatenesses of the stars in the night sky were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The collective sum or total of a group of things.
meanings.sent1: The aggregatenesses of the coins in the jar amounted to a significant value.
meanings.sent2: The aggregatenesses of the votes determined the winner of the election.
meanings.sent3: The aggregatenesses of the candies in the jar tempted everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The city's lights formed an aggregateness of brightness in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The aggregatenesses of the books on the shelf showcased a love for reading.
